item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

ok i made my own interface with lin’s prog. Runescape Interface Maker V2

i generete the code and added to class9.java
but i think i added wrong :s
i made server sided a command to see my interface.
when i use that command i log out :s

here are my interface codes.

public static void rewardshop1(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intrewardshop1 = AddTab(16023); intrewardshop1.anIntArray240 = new int[13]; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241 = new int[13]; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272 = new int[13]; //Main interface intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[0] = 16024; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //No main interface image. //Control 1 of main interface (Image) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[1] = 16025; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[1] = 4; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[1] = 16; AddInterfaceImage(16025, "rewardshop1", "mainframe1 0.png"); //Control 2 of main interface (Button) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[2] = 16026; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[2] = 154; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[2] = 247; AddInterfaceButton(16026, 82, 32, "Button", "rewardshop1", "button.png"); //Control 3 of main interface (Button) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[3] = 16027; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[3] = 265; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[3] = 247; AddInterfaceButton(16027, 82, 32, "Button", "rewardshop1", "button.png"); //Control 4 of main interface (Button) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[4] = 16028; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[4] = 375; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[4] = 247; AddInterfaceButton(16028, 82, 32, "Button", "rewardshop1", "button.png"); //Control 5 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[5] = 16029; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[5] = 61; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[5] = 190; AddInterfaceLabel(16029, "Top Hat", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 6 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[6] = 16030; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[6] = 154; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[6] = 190; AddInterfaceLabel(16030, "Fancy Boots", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 7 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[7] = 16031; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[7] = 265; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[7] = 190; AddInterfaceLabel(16031, "Fighter Boots", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 8 of main interface (Button) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[8] = 16032; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[8] = 46; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[8] = 247; AddInterfaceButton(16032, 82, 32, "Button", "rewardshop1", "button.png"); //Control 9 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[9] = 16033; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[9] = 381; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[9] = 190; AddInterfaceLabel(16033, "Black Mask", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 10 of main interface (Image) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[10] = 16034; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[10] = 19; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[10] = 43; AddInterfaceImage(16034, "rewardshop1", "Hideandseek.png"); //Control 11 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[11] = 16035; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[11] = 61; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[11] = 223; AddInterfaceLabel(16035, "1000 pts", wid, 1, 0xADFF2F); //Control 12 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[12] = 16036; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[12] = 164; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[12] = 223; AddInterfaceLabel(16036, "1200 pts", wid, 1, 0xADFF2F); //Control 13 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[13] = 16037; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[13] = 277; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[13] = 223; AddInterfaceLabel(16037, "1500 pts", wid, 1, 0xADFF2F); //Control 14 of main interface (Label) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[14] = 16038; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[14] = 385; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[14] = 223; AddInterfaceLabel(16038, "3000 pts", wid, 1, 0xADFF2F); //Control 15 of main interface (Image) intrewardshop1.anIntArray240[15] = 16039; intrewardshop1.anIntArray241[15] = 164; intrewardshop1.anIntArray272[15] = 111; AddInterfaceImage(16039, "rewardshop1", "hideandseekshop.png"); }

rewardshop1(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

[code]private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 GetInterfaceImage(String interfaceName, String s)
{
//Basically, just a user-friedly edited version of an old one.
long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8);

{
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}
try
{
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Interface Images/" + interfaceName + “/” + s);
aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2);
}
catch(Exception exception)
{
return null;
}
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}
